segments.text: I see a wide window above the sink, curtains tied back on both sides.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window panes are divided into neat, small squares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through this opening, a serene garden is perfectly visible outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Thereâ€™s a clear path with low bushes and plants, looking very calm and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fence or structure stands further back, completing the peaceful outdoor scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the chaos inside the kitchen is truly striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, everything seems to be in perfect order and harmony.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, water is pouring onto the floor, creating a widening puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit sad to see such a peaceful view against an impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is oblivious, and the children are taking risks for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This disparity between the interior and exterior is quite stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the tranquility from the garden could somehow seep into this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic setting is quite ordinary, yet so much is going wrong unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
